org.ow2.chameleon.rose
Interface ExporterService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractExporterComponent
public interface ExporterService

The ExporterService service are provided by the exporter component. It allows for supervisor component to create the endpoint thanks to the ServiceReference. For each request to export a service, an ExportRegistration is returned.

Version:
0.2.0
Author:
barjo

Method Summary
 org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.ExportRegistration exportService(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference sref, Map<String,Object> properties)

Method Detail

getConfigPrefix

List<String> getConfigPrefix()
Returns:
The configuration prefix used or defined by the exporter. (i.e json-rpc,org.jabsorb,jax-rs.

exportService

org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.ExportRegistration exportService(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference sref,
                                                                     Map<String,Object> properties)
Create an endpoint for the service of reference sref.

Parameters:
sref - The ServiceReference of the service which must be exported
properties - Additional properties provided by the framework rather than the one provided by sref
Returns:
An ExportRegistration.

getAllExportReference

Collection<org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.ExportReference> getAllExportReference()
Returns:
All ExportReference of services exported through this service.
